column2: b'Hai to Gensou no Grimgar: Furoagari no Kabe ni Kaketa Seishun - One More Centimeter'
b'Episode 2.5 of the series, will expand on the ending of episode 2 where the boys try to sneak on the girls bathing.\n\nIncluded in the 1st volume of the Blu-ray/DVD releases.'
